newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Alliance makes Singapore emerging markets HQ.
newsitem.headline: Alliance makes Singapore emerging markets HQ.

text.p: U.S. investment group Alliance Capital Management said on Tuesday it was making Singapore the global headquarters for its US$1 billion emerging markets investment activities.
Michael Laughlin, Alliance executive vice president, told reporters the move brought the management of Alliance's emerging markets funds into one location for the first time.
Previously management of funds was handled in individual territories.
He said the company currently manages funds totalling US$140 billion worldwide. -- Singapore newsroom (65 8703011)
